item.title: My......balls...... are gonna explode!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:5, topic:544716”][quote author=Limits link=topic=663593.msg4434862#msg4434862 date=1404745252]

What is this? 70s metal? Sounds good.

metal started in the 80s with the nwobhm

when I first heard this i thought it was like early 70s blues rock or something, turns out its from 1999 and its stoner rock (pretty much the same thing as blues rock)

Can’t be, this riffs are way too metal sounding.
[/quote]
how are these metal sounding? they sound really blues influenced, with all of the “swinging” riffs[/quote]

Well metal is highly influenced by blues but this song comes into mind when I listen to it

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e8hmszzyxxw&feature=kp

Read full topic
